contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary}} The term '''spreadeagle''' (also '''spread eagle''', '''spread-eagle''') can mean: *[[Spreadeagle (heraldry)]], a figure derived from a heraldic depiction of an eagle *[[Spread Eagle (horse)]], an 18th-century Thoroughbred racehorse and winner of the 1795 Epsom Derby * [[Spreadeagle (position)]], a human position in which a person is figuratively in the same position as an eagle with its wings spread and legs well apart * [[Spread eagle (figure skating)]] * [[Blood eagle]] or "spread-eagle", an alleged Viking method of execution * [[Spread Eagle, Wisconsin]] * [[Spread-eagleism]], the 19th century precursor to the term "Jingoism" * [[Spread Eagle (band)]], an American hard rock band * [[Spread Eagle (album)]], a Peter Pan Speedrock album * The Spread Eagle is the corporate logo of [[Barclays Bank]], a UK bank, and the name of their staff magazine {{disambiguation}}
